source:
%%sql
-- Build the IMS historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_information_asset_dim (
    IMSInformationAssetID,
    InformationAssetIDLegacy,
    InformationAssetIDCoded,
    InformationAssetName,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
    InformationAssetNumber,
    InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
    InformationAssetLocation,
    InformationAssetContractedService,
    InformationAssetRegion,
    InformationAssetPurpose,
    InformationAssetFinancialValue,
    InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
    InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
    InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
    InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
    InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
    InformationAssetHelp,
    InformationAssetUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
    InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
    InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
    InformationAssetCustodian,
    InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
    InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
    InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
    InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
    InformationAssetFormatList,
    InformationAssetManagementRegister,
    InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
    InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
    InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
    InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
    InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
    InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
    InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
    InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
    InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
    InformationAssetsIda,
    InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
    InformationAssetStatus,
    InformationAssetDateNextReview,
    InformationAssetOwner,
    InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
    InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
    InformationAssetDateModified,
    InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
    InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedBy,
    InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
    InformationAssetCreatedByName,
    InformationAssetDateEntered,
    InformationAssetDeleted,
    InformationAssetDescription,
    InformationAssetModifiedByName,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
    InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
    InformationAssetPriority,
    InformationAssetResolution,
    InformationAssetType,
    InformationAssetWorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.ims_information_assets_number NULLS LAST)      AS IMSInformationAssetID,
    T1.ia_id AS InformationAssetIDLegacy,
    T1.id AS InformationAssetIDCoded,
    T1.name AS InformationAssetName,
    T1.assigned_user_id AS InformationAssetAssignedUserID,
    T1.assigned_user_name AS InformationAssetAssignedUserName,
    T1.ims_information_assets_number AS InformationAssetNumber,
    T1.primary_business_area_c AS InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea,
    T1.location_c AS InformationAssetLocation,
    T1.contracted_service_c AS InformationAssetContractedService,
    T1.region_c AS InformationAssetRegion,
    T1.purpose_c AS InformationAssetPurpose,
    T1.financial_value_c AS InformationAssetFinancialValue,
    T1.business_criticality_c AS InformationAssetBusinessCritically,
    T1.data_disposal_routine_c AS InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_date AS InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate,
    T1.review_period AS InformationAssetReviewPeriod,
    IFNULL(T1.information_as_num_container_c, concat('IA - ',T1.ims_information_assets_number)) AS InformationAssetInformationAsNumberContainer,
    T1.help AS InformationAssetHelp,
    T1.user_licences AS InformationAssetUserLicenses,
    T1.superuser_licences AS InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses,
    T1.sys_admin_licences AS InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses,
    T1.infosec_risk_register AS InformationAssetInfosecRiskRegister,
    T1.custodian AS InformationAssetCustodian,
    T1.date_of_last_dr_check AS InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck,
    T1.backup_location AS InformationAssetBackUpLocation,
    T1.dr_check_frequency AS InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency,
    T1.backup_frequency AS InformationAssetBackupFrequency,
    T1.asset_format_list_c AS InformationAssetFormatList,
    T1.management_register_text_c AS InformationAssetManagementRegister,
    T1.software_version AS InformationAssetSoftwareVersion,
    T1.access_control_method AS InformationAssetAccessControlMethod,
    T1.backup_required AS InformationAssetBackUpRequired,
    T1.decommision_date AS InformationAssetDecommisionDate,
    T1.dr_test_required AS InformationAssetDrTestRequired,
    T1.encryption_at_rest AS InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_1 AS InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_2 AS InformationAssetsIMSDataFlow2,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1 AS InformationAssetsIMSMasterDataMap1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1 AS InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssets1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1_name AS InformationAssetsIMSINformationAssetsName1,
    T1.ims_inform2f55_assets_ida AS InformationAssetsIda,
    T1.ims_information_assets_aos_contracts_1 AS InformationAssetsAOSContracts,
    T1.status AS InformationAssetStatus,
    T1.date_of_next_review_c AS InformationAssetDateNextReview,
    T1.owner_c AS InformationAssetOwner,
    T1.risk_assessment_type_c AS InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType,
    T1.link_to_risk_assessment_c AS InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment,
    T1.date_modified AS InformationAssetDateModified,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetSecurityGroups,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetAssignedUserLink,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetCreatedBy,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetCreatedByLink,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetCreatedByName,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetDateEntered,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetDeleted,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetDescription,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetModifiedByName,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetModifiedByUserID,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetModifiedByUserLink,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetPriority,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetResolution,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetType,
    'No Info' AS InformationAssetWorkLog,
    7                                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    First(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from))                                       AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T1.ia_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.primary_business_area_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.location_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.contracted_service_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.region_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.purpose_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.financial_value_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.business_criticality_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_disposal_routine_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.review_period,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_as_num_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_licences,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.superuser_licences,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.sys_admin_licences,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.infosec_risk_register,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.custodian,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_last_dr_check,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.backup_location,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dr_check_frequency,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.backup_frequency,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.asset_format_list_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.management_register_text_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.software_version,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.access_control_method,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.backup_required,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.decommision_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dr_test_required,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.encryption_at_rest,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_2,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_inform2f55_assets_ida,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_information_assets_aos_contracts_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_next_review_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.risk_assessment_type_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.link_to_risk_assessment_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.',
        '.'))                                                                   AS RowID,
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_informationasset T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "IMS" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.ims_information_assets_number IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.ia_id,
    T1.id,
    T1.name,
    T1.assigned_user_id,
    T1.assigned_user_name,
    T1.ims_information_assets_number,
    T1.primary_business_area_c,
    T1.location_c,
    T1.contracted_service_c,
    T1.region_c,
    T1.purpose_c,
    T1.financial_value_c,
    T1.business_criticality_c,
    T1.data_disposal_routine_c,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_date,
    T1.review_period,
    T1.information_as_num_container_c,
    T1.help,
    T1.user_licences,
    T1.superuser_licences,
    T1.sys_admin_licences,
    T1.infosec_risk_register,
    T1.custodian,
    T1.date_of_last_dr_check,
    T1.backup_location,
    T1.dr_check_frequency,
    T1.backup_frequency,
    T1.asset_format_list_c,
    T1.management_register_text_c,
    T1.software_version,
    T1.access_control_method,
    T1.backup_required,
    T1.decommision_date,
    T1.dr_test_required,
    T1.encryption_at_rest,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_data_flow_2,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_master_data_map_1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1,
    T1.ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1_name,
    T1.ims_inform2f55_assets_ida,
    T1.ims_information_assets_aos_contracts_1,
    T1.status,
    T1.date_of_next_review_c,
    T1.owner_c,
    T1.risk_assessment_type_c,
    T1.link_to_risk_assessment_c,
    T1.date_modified
